reviewText: Excellent product, but the set's DVD case was damaged/cracked---DVD's seem to be OK though." Good communication with seller!

Excellent !!!
Hopefully I ordered season 7 from this seller. My wife who is from Debica loves the series and finally I found DVD with English subtitles so I can appreciate the series also. Thank you  =)
It's excellent. Also it's very good history lesson. I highly recommended .
waited for this to come out and very glad I bought it.  Excellent

We were awaiting for this next installment, and finally we've got it! This is next season of a very popular war series about Polish youth during the nazi occupation. After Season 2, that suppose to be the it's last, but by popular demand - it continues!
The story line is balanced. Not all Germans are bad and not all Poles are good. The story is developing to the post war times and the battles of the opposition and the new, communism based government, the new order. This series is also popular beyond Poland since the picture of those times is realistic and based on true stories of those times and shown from different angles.

THIS IS ONE OF THE BEST WAR SERIES i HAVE SEEN.
THE ACTING IS WONDERFUL, THE MAKING OF THE SERIES IS HIGH QUALITY..
I HAVE SEEN MANY BRITISH SERIES, THIS ONE IS THE SAME QUALITY, SOMETIMES BETTER.
I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT FOR EVERYBODY WHO ENJOYS WAR MOVIES OR SERIES.
HOPE THEY WILL BRING THE SERIES UP TO THE LIBERATION OF POLAND. IT DESERVES TO BE SEEN.
I WILL KEEP WAITING FOR THE NEXT SERIES.
THANK YOU FOR THE EXCELLENT JOB .
